entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor wasm - ability to independently prerender only HeadOutlet component #39333
  • Route Attribute not working as expected on ComponentBase / Blazor #39329
  • [Epic] WIP: Minimal APIs enhancements #39327
  • Perf regression: updates #39326
  • Consider enforcing `is null` instead of `== null`. #39323
  • Blazor Server Side AADB2C AllowAnonymous Not working in latest template #39321
    .NET 7 Planning
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware breaks gRPC service response #39317
  • SignalR Core StartAsync() CancellationToken not respected? #39315

Closed

  • Segmentation fault in Docker ASP.NET core startup after .net6 upgrade #39253
  • RemoteJSRuntime uses SignalR global options instead of ComponentHub options #38205
    7.0-preview1
  • SignalR HubConnection is logging an incorrect Timeout #39171
    7.0-preview1
  • Implement <NavLink> for MVC/Razor Pages #39316
  • I have searched the existing issues #39322
  • Blazor WASM: File Upload - MultipartFormDataContent.Add() throws internal Invalid JSON exception #39087
    7.0-preview1
  • IClaimsTransformation TransformAsync not called in Firefox (asp.net core 6.0 razor pages web app) #39177

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid declaring RazorPage<T>.Model as nullable by default #39332
    area-mvc
  • Using symbolic link APIs on PhysicalFileResult to obtain the real Length and LastModifiedTime #39330
  • [release/6.0] Use TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds for clientTimeoutInterval in ClientTime… #39325
    Servicing-consider, area-signalr, 6.0.x

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Work around dotnet/msbuild#3274 #39293
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.2
  • Port of Bootstrap v4 SxS support to 7.0 #38865
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove source-build workaround for sourcelink submodule issue #39324
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Enforce braces for code-blocks #39320
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Blazor RemoteJSRuntime Use SignalR Hub Options before Global Options #38947
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Use TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds for clientTimeoutInterval in ClientTime… #39318
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Stop enforcing JSON read till end if `EndInvokeJS` returns early #39075
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.2
  • Do not attempt `Publish test results` when skipping tests #39291
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Add test for preload hosted services #37401
    area-runtime
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Simplify some build infrastructure #38980
    area-infrastructure
